blogs.title: Two crystallography papers break apart for “trivial errors,” says author
blogs.summary: Biophysicists in India have retracted two crystallography papers describing protein binding sites following “concerns,” according to one retraction note. The last author on both papers, however, told us he believed the retractions wer

author.name: Retraction Watch
author.description: Tracking retractions as a window into the scientific process
